arguments.description: The x position to draw the sprite batch.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y position to draw the sprite batch.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The rotation to draw the sprite batch with.
arguments.name: r

arguments.description: The x scale to draw the sprite batch with.
arguments.name: sx

arguments.description: The y sacle to draw the sprite batch with.
arguments.name: sy

arguments.description: The quad to draw the sprite batch with.
arguments.name: quad

notes: The function returns the spritebatch object itself, so it can be used for chain calls.
